original_text: Shaaph and Sheva. Shaaph became the father of Madmannah. Sheva became the father of Makbenah and Gibea. Caleb had a daughter called Aksah.
korean_text: 또 맛만나의 아버지 사압을 낳았고 또 막베나와 기브아의 아버지 스와를 낳았으며 갈렙의 딸은 악사더라

sentences.original_text: Shaaph became the father of Madmannah.
Sheva became the father of Makbenah and Gibea.
Caleb had a daughter called Aksah.
